textBox.richText: Sorry I never posted last week's show.  I dunno, I had a lot of stuff going on, and I wasn't very proud of it... just look at the show description.  Yeah, it was just one of those weeks.  I'm not even going to post the playlist.  Not to completely downplay the show, the first two sets are definitely worth listening to, but towards the end I kinda get lazy and just play a bunch of post-rock.  Actually, now I'm lookin' over the playlist, and it was a DAMN GOOD SHOW.  I take back everything I said!  Definitely listen to the whole thing.  I was just in a funk that day, a personal issue, but not one that bleed too much into the playlist... hopefully.  Anywho, enough rambles. Here's the show direct link (right click save-as to download).  I'm not following anything I said, here's the first two sets of the playlist!: Scenario Rock - Skitzo Dancer (Justice Remix) Download Van She - AU,  Kelly (Lifelike Remix) Download GRUM - Woah (FutureFlashs Disco Mix) Download Digitalism - Apollo Gize (Breakbot Hypnotoad Mix) Download Foals - Electric Bloom (Neo Tokyo Chainsaw Massacre) Download ---AIR BREAK--- Dr. Dunks - Love Savage Download Phantom Slasher - Nicoteen Download Prince and Pearl - Not a Gun Download Cobra Cut - Night Prism Download Lykke Li - Everybody But Me Download I'll try and post a good 10 or 15 downloadable songs for each show. Alright, enough of that show. ...to be continued.
